metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31484 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
CPAN.pm before 2.35 does not verify TLS certificates when downloadingdistributions over HTTPS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-31484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcgi-fast-perl - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5
libperl5.18 - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5
perl - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5
perl-base - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5
perl-debug - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5
perl-modules - 5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: perl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.18.2-2ubuntu1.7+esm5').
